node.intro:
I am currently a Postdoc in [Boston College](https://www.bc.edu/content/bc-web/schools/mcas/departments/computer-science.html) advised by [Hsin-Hao Su](https://sites.google.com/site/distributedhsinhao/).
I obtained my Ph.D. at [University of Michigan](https://cse.umich.edu)
advised by [Seth Pettie](http://web.eecs.umich.edu/~pettie/).
I am interested in any cool analysis techniques of an algorithm, as well as any cool stuff related to graphs.
I also love [competitive programming](https://cphof.org/profile/topcoder:tmt514).

**Research Interest [[CV]](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cl1hOs15vXQZPaM1pCCZwpUdfk9158Jm/view)**:
Dynamic Graph Data Structures and Algorithms.
Asynchronous Distributed Algorithms.
Distributed Graph Algorithms.
Algorithms in Word RAM Model.
Lower bound graphs for sparse distance preservers.

I am currently a Ph.D student in
[CSE division](https://cse.umich.edu)
at [University of Michigan](https://umich.edu)
advised by [Seth Pettie](http://web.eecs.umich.edu/~pettie/).

**Research Interest**:
Dynamic Graph Data Structures and Algorithms.
Asynchronous Distributed Algorithms.
Algorithms in Word RAM Model.
Lower bound graphs for sparse distance preservers.
